title: Superspreader in Magnolia
description:
The show is forced to record via Zoom after returning from Magnolia where it would appear that the live event may have been a Covid superspreader. After battling through 60 seconds of recording, Chris steps away and Kirk is forced to embark on maybe one of his most impressive feats to date. Kirk recaps Magnolia, calls Tom Shattuck fat on numerous occasions & reacts to the unexpected passing of Gilbert Gottfried.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
